reason: Immediate Bitcoin price pullback following a failed rally attempt, coupled with high regulatory uncertainty in the U.S. due to contentious market structure bills, points to short-term downside risk and increased volatility. While institutional adoption (BNY Mellon) provides a strong long-term positive signal, it is currently overshadowed by these immediate headwinds and operational adjustments by exchanges like OKX. Investors should watch for clarity on regulatory fronts and Bitcoin's ability to hold critical support levels.
headlines: Senate Republicans race toward crypto vote on bill with uncertain Democratic buy-in
Bitcoin pulls back to $90,000 as early Friday rally attempt fails
Crypto crowd could still walk away from U.S. market structure bill if DeFi needs unmet
World's largest custodial bank BNY to offer tokenized deposits for institutional investors
Crypto exchange OKX cuts institutional staff amid global restructuring
